alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:38AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Orange County through 630 AM EDT... At 538 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Montague to near Middletown to near Bloomingburg. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Middletown and Howells around 545 AM EDT. Montgomery around 550 AM EDT. Goshen around 555 AM EDT. Walden around 600 AM EDT. Florida around 625 AM EDT. Newburgh and New Windsor around 630 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
